revision.text:
[[Image:Okres lucenec.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of Lučenec District in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]]]] '''Lipovany''' is a village and municipality in the [[Lučenec District]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia]] [[File:Lipovany panorama jar 2010.JPG|thumb|Lipovany panorama 2010]]










==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Lucenec District}} {{BanskáBystrica-geo-stub}} {{coord|48.2208|N|19.7083|E|source:kolossus-huwiki|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Lučenec District]]
